sentence.Network_en: Anyone can be an astrologer as long as they are mathematically minded.
sentence.Network_cn: 任何善于运算的人都可以成为占星家。

sentence.Network_en: The astrologer claimed to be able to divine the future.
sentence.Network_cn: 那占星家宣称能够洞悉未来.

sentence.Network_en: Allow your astrologer to provide you with regular counseling and coaching.
sentence.Network_cn: 让占星家为你提供定期的建议和辅导.

...印度占星学（Jyotish astrology）又称之为「吠陀占星学网际网路上亦有人翻译为韦达占星学，两种音译名称都可以通用。」（Vedic Astrology）或是「古印度占星学」（Ancient Hindu Astrology），是独立于今日流传广泛的西洋占星学体系的另一门占星学系统，也是.

entry.def: An astrologer is a person who uses astrology to try to tell you things about your character and your future.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who predicts the future by the positions of the planets and sun and moon
